SA05n893:2: ūṃ ūṃ ūṃ ugracaṇḍaṃ cacakitacakitaṃ caṃcarā(lā)
SA05n893:4: hū hū hūṃkārarūpaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ khaṅgapāśān dharantam |
SA05n893:5: daṃ daṃ daṃ daṇḍapāṇiṃ ḍamaruḍimiḍimāṃ ḍaṇḍamānaṃ bhramantaṃ
SA05n893:6: bhraṃ bhraṃ bhraṃ bhrāntanetraṃ jayatu vijayate siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 1 ||
SA05n893:7: ghraṃ ghraṃ ghraṃ ghorarūpaṃ ghughuritaghuritaṃ ghargharīnādaghoṣaṃ
SA05n893:8: huṃ huṃ huṃ hāsyarūpaṃ tribhuvanadharitaṃ khecaraṃ kṣetrapālam |
SA05n893:9: bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhūtanāthaṃ sakalajanahitaṃ tasya dehā (?) piśācaṃ
SA05n893:10: hū hū hūṃkāranādaiḥ sakalabhayaharaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 2 ||
SA05n893:11: vraṃ vraṃ vraṃ vyomaghoraṃ bhramati bhuvanataḥ saptapātālatālaṃ
SA05n893:12: kraṃ kraṃ kraṃ kāmarūpaṃ dhadhakitadhakitaṃ tasya haste triśūlam |
SA05n893:13: druṃ druṃ druṃ durgarūpaṃ bhramati ca caritaṃ tasya dehasvarūpaṃ
SA05n893:14: maṃ maṃ maṃ mantrasiddhaṃ sakalabhayaharaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 3 ||
SA05n893:15: jhaṃ jhaṃ jhaṃkārarūpaṃ jhamati jhamajhamā jhaṃjhamānā samantāt
SA05n893:16: kaṃ kaṃ kaṃkāladhārī dhudhuritadhuritaṃ dhundhumārī kumārī |
SA05n893:17: dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūmravarṇā bhramati bhuvanataḥ kālapāstriśūlaṃ
SA05n893:18: taṃ taṃ taṃ tīvrarūpaṃ mama bhayaharaṇaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 4 ||
SA05n893:19: raṃ raṃ raṃ rāyarudraṃ rurudhitarudhitaṃ dīrghajihvākarālaṃ
SA05n893:20: paṃ paṃ paṃ pretarūpaṃ samayavijayinaṃ sumbhadambhe nisumbhe |
SA05n893:22: hrīṃ hrīṃ hrīṃkāranāde bhavabhayaharaṇaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 5 ||
SA05n893:25: paṅke jātābhijāte curu curu curute kāminī kāṇḍakaṇṭhe
SA05n893:26: kaṅkālī kālarātrī bhagavati varade siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 6 ||
SA05n893:28: kaṃ kaṃ kaṃ kālarūpaṃ ghughuritaghuritaṃ ghuṃ ghumā bindurūpī |
SA05n893:29: dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūmravarṇā bhramati bhuvanataḥ kālapāśatriśūlaṃ
SA05n893:30: taṃ taṃ taṃ tīvrarūpaṃ mama bhayaharaṇaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 7 ||
SA05n893:31: jhrīṃ jhrīṃ jhrīṃkāravṛnde pracaritamahasā vāmahaste kapālaṃ
SA05n893:32: khaṃ khaṃ khaṃ khaṅgahaste ḍamaruḍimaḍimāṃ muṇḍamālāsuśobhām |
SA05n893:33: ruṃ ruṃ ruṃ rudramālābharaṇavibhūṣitā dirghajihvā karālā
SA05n893:34: devi śrī ugracaṇḍī bhagavati varade siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 8 ||
